options.name: channel
options.description: The channel to send the message in

options.name: message
options.description: Custom message to send (leave blank for a randomized one. Use <@member> to ping the new member)

options.name: emoji
options.description: Emoji to use in randomized message

options.name: rule-channel
options.description: Rule channel to mention in randomized message

options.name: role
options.description: Role to give the new member

options.name: role2
options.description: Another role to give the new member
